channel.title: [?]Making Customer Items[?]
channel.description: hi ya all.. i got a problem.. i made my own client (vimsie - client) and its richscape client v4.1 based.. when i try to add some of Galkons Or IceMans customer items they go into the wrong slot.. then i go into item.java. and search for the ID of the item that goes into wrong slot then there's no results. then i search for legs and add 15339 (the id of lava platelegs) to [code]public static int legs[] =[/code] saves my changes and compile.. then i log in but nvm helped!!!!

item.title: [?]Making Customer Items[?]
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

Just take it off and wear it again once the number is added to the array.

item.description:
@B_U_L_L_D_O_G wrote:

okaaaay…
i dident understood that…
so…
i’ll just tell you what i did …
then u maybe can help me…
first i was on the client…
then i weared the legs…
they goed to wep slot…
then i logged out…
(the item was still on)
then i logged in again, item was still there…
then i logged out and opened item.java. deleted the 15339 from the public int legs = [] and added it again,
saved my changes closed down the runserver.bat and compiled then i turned runserver.bat on again, and logged in, but nothing helped…

Read full topic
